Philippine: Two buses carrying pilgrims collide and fall off a ravine south of Manila, killing more than 115 in what would be the country's worst road accident.
Republic Act No. 4867 divided old Davao into the new provinces of Davao del Norte, Davao del Sur, and Davao Oriental.
A demonstration conducted by Lapiang Malaya ends in a violent disperse attempt by the Philippine Constabulary, killing 33.
Republic Act No. 4979 divided old Agusan into the new provinces of Agusan del Norte and Agusan del Sur.
ASEAN (Association of Southeast Asian Nation) was formed.
